tagline: Text classification, entity extraction, search, and language understanding built on linguistic intuition
pros: Linguistic intuition that diagnoses NLP failures other engineers can't — negation, ambiguity, tokenization issues
Full NLP stack: classification, NER, search, generation, multilingual support
Error analysis by linguistic phenomenon — targeted fixes instead of blind retraining
Annotation pipeline design that produces high-quality labeled data
cons: Doesn't build general ML infrastructure or application UIs
NLP quality depends heavily on annotation quality — garbage labels in, garbage model out
Multilingual coverage requires additional data and evaluation investment

model_recommendations.notes: Complex reasoning, architecture, security, or financial analysis. Needs the best available model with full thinking/reasoning enabled.
